description: Demolition of an existing rear extension, conversion of an existing garage into a habitable space, erection of part two storey/part single storey rear and single storey front porch extension. Hip to gable roof extension with rear dormer and juliet balcony. Installation of 4nos front rooflights.
decision_conditions: By reason of its  siting, scale, form, bulk, massing and poor design, it is considered that collectively the proposal for 154 Beresford Avenue would result in overdevelopment of the application site and would have an unacceptable adverse impact on the character and appearance of the host dwelling as well as within the immediate surrounding area and therefore be contrary to Policy D3 of London Plan 2012, Policies CS8 and DM10 in the Core Strategy (2012) and Residential Design SPD (2013).

By reason of its siting and excessive depth along the boundary, the proposed single storey rear extension would have an overbearing impact on the neighbouring property at no156 Beresford Avenue and therefore be contrary to Policy D3 of London Plan 20121 and Policies CS8 and DM10 in the Core Strategy (2012)  and Residential Design SPD (2013).
